summary: Completed testing of Al Taj Restaurant iteration 2 fixes: Customer Dashboard, Delivery status flow, Menu items with images/descriptions. All features working correctly.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 error during test (transient network issue, works on retry)

critical_code_review_comments: Customer Dashboard (/my-orders) working correctly - shows order history with status badges
Delivery flow (picked_up → on_the_way → delivered) working correctly
Menu items display with images (Unsplash) and descriptions
Delivery partner status correctly updates to 'available' after delivery completion

success_rate.backend: 96% (25 passed, 1 failed due to transient 520 error, 1 skipped)

seed_data_creation: Test orders created with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 2 features tested and working: 1) Customer Dashboard at /my-orders shows order history with Active/History tabs, 2) Delivery flow works: picked_up → on_the_way → delivered with proper button visibility, 3) Menu items have image_url and description fields populated from Unsplash. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_restaurant_features.py cover all CRUD operations and status flows.

customer_dashboard.details: Customer can login, see /my-orders page with stats (Total Orders, Active Orders, Completed, Total Spent), Active Orders tab, Order History tab with order cards showing status badges (Delivered/Cancelled)

delivery_status_flow.details: Delivery flow works correctly: picked_up shows 'Mark On The Way' button, on_the_way shows 'Mark Delivered' button, delivered clears current delivery and sets partner to available

menu_items_with_images.details: 326 menu items with image_url (Unsplash images) and description fields. Images display correctly on order page.

delivery_dashboard_refresh.details: Dashboard refreshes correctly after status updates, shows toast notifications, current delivery card appears/disappears appropriately
